document.full_text: it's not just that intensive agriculture causes nitrogen from fertilizer to volatilize into a major greenhouse gas, or that it washes into rivers; such farming is not sustainable over the long haul even on its own terms.
document.title: can the yield gap be closed - sustainably?
lines_and_colors: it's not just that intensive agriculture causes nitrogen from fertilizer to volatilize into a major greenhouse gas, or that it washes into rivers; such farming is not sustainable over the long haul even on its own terms.
